department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: face of male figure sticking his tongue out at TC, with distorted, overlapping birdlike face just R; figure is holding PR hand to chest; another hand is overlapping scene at lower R; orange drip streaks run down image; red and blue drips; multicolored smears along upper portion; linear marks lower half of image

title: For Luck
